typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SrcLegoThemes
SrcLegoThemes derive(LoadDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerColLoadDate
DerColLoadDate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table') ~> sink1
